Actions.Name: Cleansing Bolt
Actions.Effect: Does not damage allies. Deals bonus damage for each ally caught in its area of effect.

Actions.Name: Cleansing Charm
Actions.Description: The Abjurer places a charm in a free space in range 3 that lasts until the start of its next turn. Allies that end their turn adjacent to the charm can clear a status or blight.

Actions.Name: Empower Shield
Actions.Description: The Abjurer becomes immobile, but their aura of shielding increases to aura 2 and also grants cover. They can exit this stance as an action, and also exit if shoved or stunned.
